headline: Citi’s Jane Fraser is bucking the RTO trend in the hope of poaching top talent from the likes of JPMorgan
summary: CEO Jane Fraser is maintaining a hybrid work policy and positioning the bank's flexibility as a competitive recruitment advantage.

headline: Bank of America: Pay Attention To What Buffett Does Next

headline: Citi sticks to hybrid working, bucks return-to-office trend, FT reports
summary: Last month, JPMorgan Chase asked employees on hybrid work schedules to return to the office five days a week starting in March, an internal memo seen by Reuters showed.  Citi currently allows a majority of its employees to work remotely up to two days a week.  Fraser's promise came on a quarterly call with the bank's managing directors in mid-January, the newspaper reported.
